snippet: Mobile ads generally earn companies like Google less money than ads on computers, because advertisers do not know if people meant to click on an ad or accidentally clicked, known as the “fat finger effect.”
abstract: Mobile ads generally earn companies like Google less money than ads on computers, because advertisers do not know if people meant to click on an ad or accidentally clicked, known as the “fat finger effect.”

headline.main: Google Introduces a New Mobile Ad to Combat Fat Fingers
headline.print_headline:
Google Tries
A Correction
For ‘Fat Fingers’
